alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ocean County through 215 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beachwood, or 7 miles south of Toms River, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Beachwood, Seaside Heights, Mantoloking, Dover Beaches North, Holiday City South, Dover Beaches South, Holiday City-Berkeley, South Toms River, Island Heights, Silver Ridge, Gilford Park and Holiday Heights. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 74 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
